mk.tmdb.entity

Class TMDbCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • mk.tmdb.entity.TMDbEntity
      • mk.tmdb.entity.TMDbCollection

  • public class TMDbCollection
extends TMDbEntity
    Class that represents a movie collection.
    Author:
    Mirko Polato
